title: 952-D
statement: D. I'm Feeling Lucky!time limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou have one chip and one chance to play roulette. Are you feeling lucky?OutputPrint your bet. Your chip must be placed entirely within some square (not on an edge or a corner shared by adjacent squares).

processed.result:
You have one chip and one chance to bet on a roulette wheel.  You must place your chip on a single square on the roulette wheel. The chip cannot be placed on a corner or an edge shared by two squares. 

What square do you choose to place your chip on?
You have one chance to place a bet on a roulette board.  Where do you place your bet?
